acceptOwnership().details: The new owner accepts the ownership transfer.

constructor.custom:revert: if any of the constructor params addresses are zero

params._scrollWorldIDAddress: Address of the Scroll contract that will receive the new root and timestamp
params._worldIDIdentityManager: Deployment address of the WorldID Identity Manager contract

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pendingOwner().details: Returns the address of the pending owner.

propagateRoot().details: Calls this method on the L1 Proxy contract to relay roots to Scroll

renounceOwnership().details: This function is intentionally not `virtual` as we do not want it to be possible to      renounce ownership for any WorldID implementation.This function is marked as `onlyOwner` to maintain the access restriction from the base      contract.

params._scrollGasLimit: The new gas limit for the propagateRoot method
The new gas limit for the SetRootHistoryExpiry method
The new gas limit for the transferOwnershipScroll method

transferOwnership(address).details: Starts the ownership transfer of the contract to a new account. Replaces the pending transfer if there is one. Can only be called by the current owner.

transferOwnershipScroll(address,bool).custom:revert: if _owner is set to the zero address

params._isLocal: true if new owner is on Scroll, false if it is a cross-domain owner

DEFAULT_SCROLL_GAS_LIMIT().notice: The default gas limit amount to buy on Scroll

propagateRoot().notice: Sends the latest WorldID Identity Manager root to Scroll

renounceOwnership().notice: Ensures that ownership of WorldID implementations cannot be renounced.

scrollWorldIDAddress().notice: The address of the ScrollWorldID contract

setGasLimitPropagateRoot(uint32).notice: Sets the gas limit for the propagateRoot method

setGasLimitSetRootHistoryExpiry(uint32).notice: Sets the gas limit for the SetRootHistoryExpiry method

setGasLimitTransferOwnershipScroll(uint3.notice: Sets the gas limit for the transferOwnershipScroll method

setRootHistoryExpiry(uint256).notice: Adds functionality to the StateBridge to set the root history expiry on ScrollWorldID

transferOwnershipScroll(address,bool).notice: Adds functionality to the StateBridge to transfer ownership of ScrollWorldID to another contract on L1 or to a local Scroll EOA

worldIDAddress().notice: Ethereum World ID Identity Manager Address
